title: Cursed Whispers
description: Animals were Max Broderick’s life. He wasn’t only a veterinarian. He spoke with animals, quite literally, on a daily basis.He rescued a wolf on the verge of dying and was shocked beyond belief when she turned out to be a beautiful werewolf.Claudia Lupita wanted two things: her daughter and as many miles as possible separating her and the monster who’d been holding them captive for years.Determined to protect her, Max enlists help from his closest circle.Can they overcome her past, or had she lived through too much to accept her mate?Broderick Coven Series: Cursed LoveCursed SightCursed WhispersCursed TouchCursed Luck
author: A.J. Renee
